title: Resistin alleviates lipopolysaccharide-induced inflammation in bovine alveolar macrophages by activating the AMPK/mTOR signaling pathway and autophagy
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Xiaoping Ma, Aining Yang, Xiaoben Fan, Hong Liu, Yu Gu, Zhisheng Wang, Hongrui Guo, Jing Fang, Hengmin Cui, Liping Gou, Junliang Deng, Dongjie Cai, Zhicai Zuo
